flawed_nl_solution:
Ryan used 36/3 = <<36/3=12.0>>12.0 tokens on Pac-Man.
Ryan used 36/4 = <<36/4=9.0>>9.0 tokens on Candy Crush.
Ryan used a total of 12.0+9.0+7 = <<12.0+9.0+7=28.0>>28.0 tokens on all three games.
Ryan had 36-28.0 = <<36-28.0=13.0>>13.0 tokens left.
Ryan's parents bought him 2*7 = <<2*7=14>>14 more tokens.
Ryan had 13.0+14 = <<13.0+14=27.0>>27.0 tokens after his parents bought him some.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8.0, not 13.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
